title: Bug 6410 - File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: When using code assist, the file remains unchanged but is marked as dirtied.
OB: Currently, when code assist has nothing to suggest, it is still causing the file to be marked as dirtied.
EB: If code assist has nothing to suggest, it should not mark the file as dirtied.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:
1. Open a Java file.
2. Place the cursor inside the leftmost parenthesis of a method call.
   For example, consider "I" to be the cursor below:
   Object o = anotherObject.method(I);
3. Press Ctrl + Space.
